name: Volcanic Spirit
text: If you control no monsters: Special Summon 1 level 4 or lower "Volcanic" monster from your Deck, and if you do, inflict 500 damage to your opponent. The monster summoned by this card's effect cannot declare an attack. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Volcanic" monster from your GY to your hand then you can pay 500 LP to shuffle 1 of your banished "Blaze Accelerator" cards into the Deck. You can only use 1 effect of "Volcanic Spirit" per turn and only once that turn.
